channel.title: Crunch for market research firms on Online survey data analysis
channel.description: Recent content in Crunch for market research firms on Online survey data analysis

item.title: The survey analysis tool you need
item.description: Weighting Stats testing Advanced filters (nesting variables) Custom interactions Multiway tables or 3D tables with 3 variables Time series charts Grids & scorecards

item.title: testimonial
item.description: “Crunch.io has been very successful for our clients. In the past, all clients’ queries channeled through us. Now, clients are using Crunch.io by themselves to answer their own questions. They are less reliant on us for inquiries, freeing up my team’s time.” DIRECTOR, CONSUMER RESEARCH, Nielsen IQ
